name: Black Coffee Barbecue Sauce
keywords: black coffee, dark molasses, ketchup, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup very strong coffee, preferably espresso
1/2 cup firmly packed dark brown sugar
3 fresh hot chili peppers, like jalapenos, halved and seeded
2 tablespoons hot dry mustard, mixed with 1 tablespoon water

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a medium nonreactive saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, then reduce to low. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Allow mixture to cool. Puree in a food processor or blender until smooth. Strain. May be stored, covered and refrigerated, for up to two weeks.
